name: Backstab
effect: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Desk Imp
flavor: "I feel inky!"

name: Desperate Prayer
effect: Restore 5 Health to each hero.
flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

name: Devouring Swarm
effect: Choose an enemy minion. Your minions attack it, then return any that die to your hand.
flavor: Collect… essence.

name: Flurry (Rank 1)
effect: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

name: Horn of Winter
effect: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Much better than the Horn of Loseter.

name: Hot Streak
effect: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

name: Innervate
effect: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Lightning Bloom
effect: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals. Overload: (2)
flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Murloc Tinyfin
flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

name: Pounce
effect: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Preparation
effect: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Provoke
effect: Tradeable Choose a friendly minion. Enemy minions attack it.
flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

name: Raise Dead
effect: Deal 3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Ritual of Doom
effect: Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavor: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"

name: Serpentbloom
effect: Give a friendly Beast Poisonous.
flavor: "Awww, it's so cute!" —Famous last words

name: Shadowstep
effect: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance. Crowds love it.

name: Sigil of Silence
effect: At the start of your next turn, Silence all enemy minions.
flavor: A little heard-of spell.

name: Snowflipper Penguin
flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

name: Abusive Sergeant
effect: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Adorable Infestation
effect: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

name: Air Elemental
effect: Elusive
flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

name: Aldor Attendant
effect: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Altar of Fire
effect: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
flavor: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

name: Animated Broomstick
effect: Rush Battlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

name: Arcane Anomaly
effect: After you cast a spell, give this minion +1 Health.
flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.

name: Arcane Artificer
effect: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Arcane Shot
effect: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves. The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Argent Squire
effect: Divine Shield
flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Armor Vendor
effect: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to each hero.
flavor: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

name: Athletic Studies
effect: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: It's a quick read.

name: Avenge
effect: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force". Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

name: Babbling Book
effect: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

name: Battlefiend
effect: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Beaming Sidekick
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Blackjack Stunner
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

name: Blackwater Cutlass
effect: Tradeable After you Trade this, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Popular around Stormwind for slashing prices.

name: Bladed Cultist
effect: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

name: Blessed Goods
effect: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
effect: Battlecry: The next weapon you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Piracy is technically a discount.

name: Body Bagger
effect: Battlecry: Gain a Corpse.
flavor: Gotta get that bag.

name: Brain Freeze
effect: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal 3 damage to it.
flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Buccaneer
effect: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

name: Call of the Grave
effect: Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

name: Candleshot
effect: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

name: Carrion Studies
effect: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

name: Cleric of An'she
effect: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

name: Cogmaster
effect: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

name: Command the Elements
effect: Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

name: Conviction (Rank 1)
effect: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

name: Crimson Clergy
effect: Overheal: Draw a card.
flavor: He won't drop the ball.

name: Crimson Sigil Runner
effect: Outcast: Draw a card.
flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

name: Curse of Agony
effect: Shuffle three Agonies into the opponent's deck. They deal Fatigue damage when drawn.
flavor: Now, fools, you shall all understand my back pain!

name: Deadly Poison
effect: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

name: Defend the Dwarven District
effect: Questline: Deal damage with 3 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

name: Demon Companion
effect: Summon a random Demon Companion.
flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

name: Demonic Studies
effect: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Devolving Missiles
effect: Shoot three missiles at random enemy minions that transform them into ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Double Jump
effect: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
flavor: The key to every speed run.

name: Draconic Studies
effect: Discover a Dragon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Dreadprison Glaive
effect: Honorable Kill: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to the enemy hero.
flavor: Keep your allies close. Keep your evil demons in your weapon.

name: Druid of the Reef
effect: Choose One - Transform into a 3/1 Shark with Rush; or a 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
flavor: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

name: Elven Archer
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date. She'll shoot you down.

name: Elwynn Boar
effect: Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a Thousand Truths. ( /7)
flavor: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.

name: Emerald Skytalon
effect: Rush
flavor: Sworn protectors of Ysera at the Emerald Dragonshrine, these majestic owls have been touched by the powers of the Emerald Dream, taking on an almost crystalline appearance.

name: Enchanted Raven
flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!

name: Ethereal Augmerchant
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
flavor: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

name: Evocation
effect: Fill your hand with random Mage spells. They are Temporary.
flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Execute
effect: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Feast of Souls
effect: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn. ( )
flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!

name: Felosophy
effect: Copy the lowest Cost Demon in your hand. Outcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: Felscream Blast
effect: Lifesteal. Deal 1 damage to a minion and its neighbors.
flavor: All the souls start running when they see the felscream truck.

name: Final Gasp
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it dies, summon a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect.
flavor: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

name: Final Showdown
effect: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).
flavor: Finally. The last Hearthstone card.

name: Find the Imposter
effect: Questline: Play 2 SI:7 cards. Reward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

name: Fire Fly
effect: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

name: First Day of School
effect: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: First Flame
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Flame Geyser
effect: Deal 2 damage. Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Flame Imp
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire. They just do.

name: Flash Heal
effect: Restore 5 Health.
flavor: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Focused Will
effect: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavor: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.

name: Font of Power
effect: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: It's Comic Sans.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Fury (Rank 1)
effect: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

name: Galloping Savior
effect: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
flavor: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

name: Gift of the Naaru
effect: Restore 3 Health to all characters. If any are still damaged, draw a card.
flavor: What do I look like, a charity?

name: Glacial Shard
effect: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

name: Glacier Racer
effect: Spellburst: Deal 3 damage to all Frozen enemies.
flavor: It’s just not the same without a super suit.

name: Gnome Private
effect: Honorable Kill: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She's doing her part.

name: Grave Defiler
effect: Battlecry: Copy a Fel spell in your hand.
flavor: She keeps her Fel spells nice and organized in her defiling cabinet.

name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
effect: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

name: Guardian Augmerchant
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
flavor: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

name: Guidance
effect: Look at two spells. Add one to your hand or Overload: (1) to get both.
flavor: Plainsrunning will result in disqualification.

name: Heart Strike
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, gain a Corpse.
flavor: Love hurts.

name: Helboar
effect: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

name: Hit It Very Hard
effect: Gain +10 Attack and "Can't attack heroes" this turn.
flavor: "...and very fast."

name: Holy Smite
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Illidari Studies
effect: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Don't read texts and drive."

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Infectious Sporeling
effect: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious Sporeling.
flavor: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Intrepid Initiate
effect: Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: How you like them apples?

name: Investment Opportunity
effect: Draw an Overload card.
flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Irondeep Trogg
effect: After your opponent casts a spell, summon another Irondeep Trogg.
flavor: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
effect: Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
flavor: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Jeweled Macaw
effect: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Judgment of Justice
effect: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Kindling Elemental
effect: Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Burn baby burn. Little inferno!

name: Knight of Anointment
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Holy spell.
flavor: "I dub thee... injured."

name: Lab Partner
effect: Spell Damage +1
flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Leatherworking Kit
effect: After three friendly Beasts die, draw a Beast and give it +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. (Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavor: In ancient woods, elves fought the curse The demon’s shadow to disperse But hatred raged and frail souls turned Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Living Roots
effect: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Lock and Load
effect: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
flavor: Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time. Lock and load." This card pays homage to that special moment.

name: Lost in the Park
effect: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

name: Meeting Stone
effect: At the end of your turn, add a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect to your hand.
flavor: "I'm clicking on it, but nothing's happening."

name: Metamorfin
effect: Taunt Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

name: Mistress of Mixtures
effect: Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

name: Mortal Coil
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Muck Pools
effect: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

name: Murloc Tidecaller
effect: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Murmy
effect: Reborn
flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Mystery Winner
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

name: Nature Studies
effect: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

name: Noble Sacrifice
effect: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Northshire Cleric
effect: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: Novice Zapper
effect: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.

name: Noxious Cadaver
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to an enemy and your hero.
flavor: Shouldn't have eaten that gas station sushi.

name: Oh My Yogg!
effect: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavor: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Overdraft
effect: Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Overwhelm
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

name: Paralytic Poison
effect: Give your weapon +1 Attack and "Your hero is Immune while attacking."
flavor: The hammer is overkill.

name: Parrrley
effect: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

name: Partner Assignment
effect: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to your hand.
flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

name: Peasant
effect: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

name: Pen Flinger
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to your hand.
flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

name: Plagued Grain
effect: Gain 4 Corpses. Shuffle four Crates into your deck that summon a 2/2 Undead when drawn.
flavor: Oh, don’t mind the smell. They're just aged!

name: Possessed Villager
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

name: Primordial Studies
effect: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
effect: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

name: Prize Plunderer
effect: Combo: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Psychic Conjurer
effect: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Raid the Docks
effect: Questline: Play 3 Pirates. Reward: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

name: Raven Idol
effect: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

name: Reckoning
effect: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
flavor: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."

name: Reliquary of Souls
effect: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Renew
effect: Restore 3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Resizing Pouch
effect: Discover a card with Cost equal to your remaining Mana Crystals.
flavor: Just don't put a Resizing Pouch inside the Resizing Pouch.

name: Revolve
effect: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
flavor: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

name: Righteous Protector
effect: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Rise to the Occasion
effect: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards. Reward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

name: Rocket Augmerchant
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
flavor: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

name: Runeforging
effect: Draw a weapon. Spend a Corpse to reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: I swear the runes are genuine!

name: Safety Inspector
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle the lowest-Cost card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card.
flavor: "All right, you're good. No sign of safety anywhere."

name: Sanguine Depths
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor: There may not be any skeletons in the closets at Castle Nathria, but there sure are souls in the basement.

name: Savory Deviate Delight
effect: Transform a minion in both players' hands into a Pirate or Stealth minion.
flavor: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

name: Secret Passage
effect: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: Seek Guidance
effect: Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

name: Shadow Council
effect: Replace your hand with random Demons. Give them +2/+2.
flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

name: Shadow Word: Devour
effect: Choose a minion. It steals 1 Health from ALL other minions.
flavor: Devouring souls is like a buffet. You have to take a little bit of everything.

name: Shadowblade Slinger
effect: Battlecry: If you've taken damage this turn, deal that much to an enemy minion.
flavor: Throwing knives isn’t easy for a warlock. It’s quite painful, in fact.

name: Shadowcloth Needle
effect: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 1 damage to all enemies. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

name: Shard of the Naaru
effect: Tradeable Silence all enemy minions.
flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

name: Shield of Honor
effect: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: Shield Slam
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Ship's Chirurgeon
effect: After you summon a minion, give it +1 Health.
flavor: Knows the answer to every medical question except how to pronounce his name.

name: Shiver Their Timbers!
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal 5 instead.
flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

name: Shivering Sorceress
effect: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Remember to use your sick days wisely.

name: Shooting Star
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.

name: Shoulder Check
effect: Tradeable Give a minion +2/+1 and Rush.
flavor: One... two... yeah, all present and correct.

name: SI:7 Extortion
effect: Tradeable Deal 3 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

name: Sigil of Alacrity
effect: At the start of your next turn, draw a card and reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

name: Silverleaf Poison
effect: Give your weapon "After your hero attacks, draw a card."
flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

name: Sinister Strike
effect: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off. Sinister, even.

name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
effect: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.

name: Skeletal Sidekick
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.
flavor: He's got your back. And your arm.

name: Slam
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Snap Freeze
effect: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

name: Sorcerer's Gambit
effect: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

name: Soulbound Ashtongue
effect: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

name: Southsea Deckhand
effect: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Sow the Soil
effect: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: "I'M NOT A TAILOR!"

name: Spawnpool Forager
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Tinyfin.
flavor: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

name: Sphere of Sapience
effect: At the start of your turn, look at your top card. You can put it on the bottom and lose 1 Durability.
flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

name: Spiked Wheel
effect: Has +3 Attack while your hero has Armor.
flavor: Great for driving, terrible for steering.

name: Spirit Bomb
effect: Deal 4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Spirit Claws
effect: Has +2 Attack while you have Spell Damage.
flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

name: Spirit Jailer
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Springpaw
effect: Rush Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx with Rush to your hand.
flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

name: Spymistress
effect: Stealth
flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

name: Stage Dive
effect: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavor: The most metal trust fall.

name: Stockades Guard
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Taunt.
flavor: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

name: Sunscale Raptor
effect: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.
flavor: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—

name: Swashburglar
effect: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Sword and Board
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: The Demon Seed
effect: Questline: Take 10 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: Throw Glaive
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a temporary copy of this to your hand.
flavor: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Tour Guide
effect: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Tracking
effect: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Trueaim Crescent
effect: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavor: You could have just pointed.

name: Tuskpiercer
effect: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion.
flavor: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Unstable Felbolt
effect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Vibrant Squirrel
effect: Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Voidtouched Attendant
effect: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

name: Voidwalker
effect: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
effect: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Wailing Vapor
effect: After you play an Elemental, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

name: Wand Thief
effect: Combo: Discover a Mage spell.
flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Warsong Envoy
effect: Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack for each damaged character.
flavor: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

name: Wave of Apathy
effect: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: Webspinner
effect: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

name: Whetstone Hatchet
effect: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
flavor: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

name: Whirlwind
effect: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Wicked Shipment
effect: Tradeable Summon 1/1 (Imp, Imps). (Upgrades by 2 when Traded!)
flavor: All horns on deck!

name: Wicked Whispers
effect: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

name: Wildfire
effect: Your Hero Power deals 1 more damage this game.
flavor: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

name: Windchill
effect: Freeze a minion. Draw a card.
flavor: The thermometer says it’s 0° right now, but with the windchill it feels like -25°.

name: Wings of Hate (Rank 1)
effect: Summon two 1/1 Felwings. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: For one day each February, they become the Wings of Love.

name: Wolpertinger
effect: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
effect: Stealth
flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Wound Prey
effect: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

name: Yoink!
effect: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
flavor: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

name: Young Priestess
effect: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
effect: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Oozes love Flamenco. Don't ask.

name: Ambush
effect: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

name: Amplified Snowflurry
effect: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0) and Freezes the target.
flavor: I bet it’s just exaggerating.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
effect: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (1)
flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Annoy-o-Tron
effect: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

name: Apexis Smuggler
effect: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

name: Apothecary's Caravan
effect: At the start of your turn, summon a 1-Cost minion from your deck.
flavor: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

name: Arcanologist
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Argent Braggart
effect: Battlecry: Set this minion's Attack and Health to the highest in the battlefield.
flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Argent Protector
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Armorsmith
effect: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Ashtongue Slayer
effect: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

name: Astromancer Solarian
effect: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Auctioneer Jaxon
effect: Whenever you Trade, Discover a card from your deck to draw instead.
flavor: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

name: Auctionhouse Gavel
effect: After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

name: Bamboozle
effect: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

name: Bash
effect: Deal 3 damage. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice. It doesn't.

name: Battle Vicar
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Holy spell.
flavor: She's the most down-to-earth paladin you'll ever meet... until she stands up.

name: Battlefield Necromancer
effect: At the end of your turn, raise a Corpse as a 1/3 Risen Footman with Taunt.
flavor: Coming soon: the Hand Necromancer and the Deck Necromancer.

name: Battleworn Vanguard
effect: After your hero attacks, summon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavor: "Welcome to Dun Baldar Felwings! Do you want 'em mild, spicy, or BURNING Legion?"

name: Bladestorm
effect: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavor: Dear minions: Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh. Best regards, Bladestorm

name: Bless
effect: Give a minion +2 Health, then set its Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor: Bless is bmore.

name: Blood Tap
effect: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Spend 2 Corpses to give them +1/+1 more.
flavor: Come join us in the tavern! We have whatever you're drinking on tap. Yes, even that.

name: Bloodbound Imp
effect: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
effect: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Bloodsail Raider
effect: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Bloodseeker
effect: Honorable Kill: Gain +1/+1.
flavor: What do you mean shooting them in the back isn’t honorable?!

name: Bola Shot
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion and 2 damage to its neighbors.
flavor: On second thought, bolas aren't very good against flying worms.

name: Bolner Hammerbeak
effect: After you play a Battlecry minion, repeat the first Battlecry played this turn.
flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

name: Bonechewer Brawler
effect: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

name: Bonedigger Geist
effect: Battlecry: Spend a Corpse to gain +1/+2.
flavor: He's a grave-half-full kind of geist.

name: Boneweb Egg
effect: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Bracing Cold
effect: Restore 5 Health to your hero. Reduce the Cost of a random spell in your hand by (2).
flavor: Worst. Hug. Ever.

name: Bulk Up
effect: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
flavor: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

name: Bumper Car
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides? bump

name: Cagematch Custodian
effect: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Cleans up after a dust up.

name: Capture Coldtooth Mine
effect: Choose One - Draw your lowest Cost card; or Draw your highest Cost card.
flavor: We hit a huge haul! Or wait… no, it's just a coin.

name: Cat Trick
effect: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."

name: Celestial Ink Set
effect: After you spend 5 Mana on spells, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (5). Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: "Dear Mother, I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time. Cordially, Your child"

name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
effect: Deal 2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

name: Chaos Strike
effect: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!" "When do we want it?" "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Cheat Death
effect: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Reported.

name: City Tax
effect: Tradeable Lifesteal. Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

name: Clawfury Adept
effect: Battlecry: Give all other friendly characters +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: The Inept Clawfury is a danger only to themselves.

name: Cold Blood
effect: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Composting
effect: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Draw a card."
flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

name: Condemn (Rank 1)
effect: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
effect: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

name: Confection Cyclone
effect: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your hand.
flavor: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Conjure Mana Biscuit
effect: Add a Biscuit to your hand that refreshes 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: So THIS is why she was AFK.

name: Corporal
effect: Honorable Kill: Give your other minions Divine Shield.
flavor: When he’s sitting in the graveyard ready to rez, he’s incorporal.

name: Corsair Cache
effect: Draw a weapon. Give it +1/+1.
flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

name: Costumed Entertainer
effect: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

name: Crabrider
effect: Rush Windfury
flavor: "Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a crab…"

name: Cram Session
effect: Draw 1 (card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Crazed Alchemist
effect: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Cruel Taskmaster
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Cult Neophyte
effect: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Dancing Cobra
effect: Corrupt: Gain Poisonous.
flavor: Snakes are just tentacles with fangs.

name: Darkshire Librarian
effect: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

name: Deathmatch Pavilion
effect: Summon a 3/2 Duelist. If your hero attacked this turn, summon another.
flavor: Worth it for the stuffed toy at the end.

name: Deck of Lunacy
effect: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

name: Deeprun Engineer
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Mech. It costs (1) less.
flavor: Deeprun Tram instructions: 300,000 pieces, 600,000 steps.

name: Defias Leper
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Do NOT eat Cookie’s Seafood Surprise.

name: Defile
effect: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

name: Defrost
effect: Draw a card. Spend 2 Corpses to draw another.
flavor: Shouldn't this NOT be a Frost spell?

name: Diligent Notetaker
effect: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
effect: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Dirty Rat
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavor: It's not his fault… Someone keeps stealing his soap!

name: Dirty Tricks
effect: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, draw 2 cards.
flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

name: Doggie Biscuit
effect: Tradeable Give a minion +2/+3. After you Trade this, give a friendly minion Rush.
flavor: Reserved for Edwin’s favorite lapdogs.

name: Don't Feed the Animals
effect: Give all Beasts in your hand +1/+1. Corrupt: Give them +2/+2 instead.
flavor: They're still cleaning up the mess from the last time someone fed the basilisk a deep fried candybar.

name: Doomsayer
effect: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Dragonbane Shot
effect: Deal 2 damage. Honorable Kill: Add a Dragonbane Shot to your hand.
flavor: *Only effective against small dragons.

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Drain Soul
effect: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Dun Baldar Bunker
effect: At the end of your turn, draw a Secret and set its Cost to (1). Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Brutalist architecture for brutal times.

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
effect: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Earthen Scales
effect: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

name: Encumbered Pack Mule
effect: Taunt When you draw this, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."

name: Equality
effect: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Eviscerate
effect: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Explosive Sheep
effect: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

name: Explosive Trap
effect: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Faerie Dragon
effect: Elusive
flavor: Adorable. Immune to Magic. Doesn't pee on the rug. The perfect pet!

name: Fallen Hero
effect: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
flavor: And he can't get up.

name: Fan of Knives
effect: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Far Watch Post
effect: Can't attack. After your opponent draws a card, it costs (1) more (up to 10).
flavor: Dabu, man. Like, far out.

name: Fel Barrage
effect: Deal 2 damage to the lowest Health enemy, twice.
flavor: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

name: Felfire Deadeye
effect: Your Hero Power costs (1) less.
flavor: She only shoots people who pet her cat without asking first.

name: Field of Strife
effect: Your minions have +1 Attack. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: I heard it's lovely there around this time of year.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Flametongue Totem
effect: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flash of Light
effect: Restore 4 Health. Draw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Florist
effect: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a Nature spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Trade district. Trade district a shop. Color Legendary. Color Legendary golden. Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

name: Fogsail Freebooter
effect: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.

name: Forsaken Lieutenant
effect: Stealth. After you play a Deathrattle minion, become a 2/2 copy of it with Rush.
flavor: WE didn’t forsake him. He CHOSE to defend a tower against the entire Alliance front line by himself.

name: Foxy Fraud
effect: Battlecry: Your next Combo card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Freezing Trap
effect: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Frightened Flunky
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Frost Strike
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, Discover a Frost Rune card.
flavor: Anyone up for some frost bowling?

name: Frostbite
effect: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Your opponent's next spell costs (2) more.
flavor: The sad reality of a raging toothpaste addiction.

name: Frostbolt
effect: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frozen Buckler
effect: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
flavor: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

name: Furious Felfin
effect: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

name: Furious Howl
effect: Draw a card. Repeat until you have at least 3 cards.
flavor: Hunters make the worst neighbors.

name: Game Master
effect: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavor: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Gankster
effect: Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
flavor: UGH! IM GETTING MY MAIN!

name: Garrote
effect: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Shuffle 3 Bleeds into your deck that deal 2 more when drawn.
flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

name: Gibberling
effect: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
effect: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Guess the Weight
effect: Draw a card. Guess if your next card costs more or less to draw it.
flavor: "And then at the last second, I'll shapeshift into cat form!"

name: Hand of A'dal
effect: Give a minion +2/+1. Draw a card.
flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Harbinger of Winter
effect: Deathrattle: Draw a Frost spell.
flavor: Winter: it be comin'.

name: Harbor Scamp
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

name: Headhunter's Hatchet
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

name: Hecklefang Hyena
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Even their teeth are laughing at you.

name: Hematurge
effect: Battlecry: Spend a Corpse to Discover a Blood Rune card.
flavor: She's here to PUMP! YOU UP!

name: Holy Champion
effect: Overheal: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She really likes seeing people get better. That's why she hurts them in the first place.

name: Holy Light
effect: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Horrendous Growth
effect: Corrupt: Gain +1/+1. Can be Corrupted endlessly.
flavor: Stop picking at it! You’re only making it worse.

name: Ice Trap
effect: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
flavor: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Iceblood Garrison
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all minions. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: On weekends, it hosts the local community theater rehearsals.

name: Ignite
effect: Deal damage. Shuffle an Ignite into your deck that deals one more damage.
flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

name: Immolation Aura
effect: Deal 1 damage to all minions twice.
flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
effect: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Imprisoned Felmaw
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, attack a random enemy.
flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

name: Imprisoned Phoenix
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. Spell Damage +2
flavor: It's actually pretty easy to escape chains when you can burst into flames.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. Rush
flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

name: In Formation!
effect: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Injured Tol'vir
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Me-OW!

name: Insight
effect: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Ironbark
effect: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavor: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
effect: Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Keen Reflex
effect: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Honorable Kill: Gain +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

name: Kobold Geomancer
effect: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Kolkar Pack Runner
effect: After you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: Is he running or galloping?

name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
effect: Charge, Lifesteal After you play a card with Outcast, return this to your hand.
flavor: Illidan taught her that demon hunters should sacrifice EVERYTHING… but she still brought Lifesteal just in case.

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Landslide
effect: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. If you're Overloaded, deal 1 damage again.
flavor: "And they win it by a landslide! Wait, where did all the other racers go?"

name: Libram of Wisdom
effect: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

name: Living Seed (Rank 1)
effect: Draw a Beast. Reduce its Cost by (1). (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Every desert needs an oasis. And it's Guff's duty to make it happen.

name: Loot Hoarder
effect: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Always roll need.

name: Luminous Geode
effect: After a friendly minion is healed, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: No take candle. BE CANDLE.

name: Lunar Eclipse
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Your next spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: When the Azeroth is between the Sun and the Moon.

name: Lushwater Murcenary
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
flavor: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

name: Lushwater Scout
effect: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

name: Mad Bomber
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Maelstrom Portal
effect: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.

name: Maestra of the Masquerade
effect: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

name: Mailbox Dancer
effect: Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
flavor: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.

name: Man the Cannons
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion and 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Now THAT’S a lotta splash damage!

name: Man-at-Arms
effect: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Arch nemesis of the Man-at-Legs.

name: Mana Geode
effect: Overheal: Summon a 2/2 Crystal.
flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

name: Manafeeder Panthara
effect: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

name: Mark of the Spikeshell
effect: Give a minion +2/+2. If it has Taunt, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "I'm DEFINITELY turtle-y enough for the turtle club."

name: Mark of the Wild
effect: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3. (+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Menacing Nimbus
effect: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

name: Midway Maniac
effect: Taunt
flavor: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Minefield
effect: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavor: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Mo'arg Artificer
effect: All minions take double damage from spells.
flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

name: Moonlit Guidance
effect: Discover a copy of a card in your deck. If you play it this turn, draw the original.
flavor: Guff always makes the best decisions after 2 AM.

name: Murgur Murgurgle
effect: Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Necrotic Mortician
effect: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, Discover an Unholy Rune card.
flavor: Her hair, just like her name, is full of 'tic's.

name: Nerubian Egg
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Netherwalker
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
flavor: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

name: Nitroboost Poison
effect: Give a minion +2 Attack. Corrupt: And your weapon.
flavor: Pouring iced milk into your vehicle's fuel tank does NOT provide a Nitro boost, but it does go great with your victory cookies.

name: Noble Mount
effect: G ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

name: Oasis Thrasher
effect: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

name: Obliterate
effect: Destroy a minion. Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Why is 6 afraid of 7? Because Obliterate 9!

name: Open the Cages
effect: Secret: When your turn starts, if you control two minions, summon an Animal Companion.
flavor: "Coming out of my cage, and I'm dead by turn nine..."

name: Pack Tactics
effect: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
flavor: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

name: Pandaren Importer
effect: Battlecry: Discover a spell that didn't start in your deck.
flavor: She carries everything you didn't want and more!

name: Parade Leader
effect: After you summon a Rush minion, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: He's always going to reign on his parade.

name: Patient Assassin
effect: Stealth Poisonous
flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Peon
effect: Frenzy: Add a random spell from your class to your hand.
flavor: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.

name: Perpetual Flame
effect: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
flavor: Flame is perpetual.* *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

name: Plagiarize
effect: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

name: Plated Beetle
effect: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

name: Power of the Wild
effect: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavor: Never look a panther in the eye. Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'? Well, it's one of those.

name: Power Word: Feast
effect: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Prestor's Pyromancer
effect: Battlecry: Your next Fire spell has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

name: Primordial Glyph
effect: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

name: Prize Vendor
effect: Battlecry: Each player draws a card.
flavor: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Prospector's Caravan
effect: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

name: Pursuit of Justice
effect: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Quick Shot
effect: Deal 3 damage. If your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavor: Han shot first.

name: Radiant Elemental
effect: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

name: Ram Commander
effect: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Rams with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Get your RAM in pairs for better performance.

name: Rat Trap
effect: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

name: Razorboar
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
flavor: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

name: Razormane Battleguard
effect: The first Taunt minion you play each turn costs (2) less.
flavor: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

name: Reconnaissance
effect: Discover a Deathrattle minion from another class. It costs (2) less.
flavor: “But Commander, I already did the connaissance.”

name: Redeemed Pariah
effect: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Redgill Razorjaw
effect: Rush
flavor: One fish, two fish, red fish replaces blue fish.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
effect: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Resistance Aura
effect: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more. Lasts enemy turns.
flavor: Perfect for defending against Beasts. Specifically small ones. Like, a very specific species of small insectoid animal. Ants. It resists ants.

name: Ring of Courage
effect: Tradeable Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each enemy minion.
flavor: Now to find the Ring of Wisdom and Ring of Power.

name: Ringmaster's Baton
effect: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: River Crocolisk
flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Rock Rager
effect: Taunt
flavor: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
effect: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rune Dagger
effect: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

name: Runed Orb
effect: Deal 2 damage. Discover a spell.
flavor: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

name: Rustsworn Initiate
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with Spell Damage +1.
flavor: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

name: Sap
effect: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
effect: Draw a Beast. Give it +3/+3.
flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

name: Scavenging Hyena
effect: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything. Even Brussels sprouts.

name: Seeds of Destruction
effect: Shuffle four Rifts into your deck. They summon a 3/3 Dread Imp when drawn.
flavor: May your harvest be dreadful.

name: Selective Breeder
effect: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a Beast in your deck.
flavor: His ethics are top notch. Just look at that smiling kitty!

name: Serena Bloodfeather
effect: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

name: Sethekk Veilweaver
effect: After you cast a spell on a minion, add a Priest spell to your hand.
flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

name: Shadow Ascendant
effect: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

name: Shadow Clone
effect: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it with Stealth.
flavor: "You thought you were attacking face, but it was me! You!"

name: Shadow Word: Death
effect: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
effect: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shadowform
effect: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
effect: After you play a Secret, Discover a Secret from a different class.
flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

name: Shenanigans
effect: Secret: When your opponent draws their second card in a turn, transform it into a Banana.
flavor: It's not personal, it's just monkey business.

name: Shield Block
effect: Gain 5 Armor. Draw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Showstopper
effect: Deathrattle: Silence all minions.
flavor: This act is killing it!

name: SI:7 Skulker
effect: Stealth Battlecry: The next card you draw costs (1) less.
flavor: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

name: Sightless Watcher
effect: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Sigil of Flame
effect: At the start of your next turn, deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"

name: Sigil of Summoning
effect: At the start of your next turn, summon two 2/2 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Look, summoning ain’t exactly a science. Sometimes it takes a turn.

name: Siphon Mana
effect: Deal 2 damage. Honorable Kill: Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Why spend mine when I can take yours?

name: Sleetbreaker
effect: Battlecry: Add a Windchill to your hand.
flavor: Likes chilly, hates chili.

name: Snack Run
effect: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

name: Snake Trap
effect: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Sneaky Delinquent
effect: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

name: Sneaky Scout
effect: Stealth Honorable Kill: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: Do you know what they call Scouts that aren't sneaky? Target practice.

name: Solar Eclipse
effect: The next spell you cast this turn casts twice.
flavor: When the Moon is between the Sun and the Azeroth.

name: Soldier's Caravan
effect: At the start of your turn, summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

name: Soothsayer's Caravan
effect: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

name: Soul Shear
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: South Coast Chieftain
effect: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2 damage.
flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!

name: Spectral Sight
effect: Draw a card. Outcast: Draw another.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

name: Spirit Mount
effect: Give a minion +1/+2 and Spell Damage +1. When it dies, summon a Spirit Raptor.
flavor: Bru'kan said his spirit would always be with us. He failed to mention that his raptor’s would be too.

name: Stage Hand
effect: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Starscryer
effect: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Stockades Prisoner
effect: Starts Dormant. After you play 3 cards, this awakens.
flavor: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

name: Stormpike Quartermaster
effect: After you cast a spell, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Frozen funnel cakes taste just like ice cream, if you pretend real hard.

name: Sunreaver Spy
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Sweet Tooth
effect: Corrupt: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavor: He's been eyeballing that ice cream cone all day!

name: Swindle
effect: Draw a spell. Combo: And a minion.
flavor: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Sword of the Fallen
effect: After your hero attacks, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

name: Talented Arcanist
effect: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."

name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
effect: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
effect: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavor: Red, the color of subtlety.

name: The Lobotomizer
effect: Honorable Kill: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor: This may hurt a little, but don't worry, you won't remember it.

name: Thorngrowth Sentries
effect: Summon two 1/2 Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

name: Thrive in the Shadows
effect: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
effect: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
effect: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: To the Front!
effect: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
flavor: Except healers. You go to the back.

name: Toad of the Wilds
effect: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
flavor: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

name: Tooth of Nefarian
effect: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: Nefarian: Lord of Blackrock, creator of the chromatic dragonflight, victim of several root canals.

name: Toxicologist
effect: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

name: Transfer Student
effect: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavor: Oh, the places you'll go! There is so much to fight! There are boards to be explored. There are dreams to take flight.

name: Trick Totem
effect: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Twilight Deceptor
effect: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Unstable Shadow Blast
effect: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits your hero.
flavor: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

name: Vanessa VanCleef
effect: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
flavor: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.

name: Vitality Surge
effect: Draw a minion. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

name: Wandering Monster
effect: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

name: Wandmaker
effect: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to your hand.
flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
effect: Deal 2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.

name: Wickerclaw
effect: After your hero gains Attack, this minion gains +2 Attack.
flavor: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

name: Wild Pyromancer
effect: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM! BAD IS GOOD! DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Windfury
effect: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Wrath
effect: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Wriggling Horror
effect: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
effect: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Ace Hunter Kreen
effect: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

name: Acolyte of Death
effect: After a friendly Undead dies, draw a card.
flavor: "I see dead people. A LOT of dead people."

name: Acolyte of Pain
effect: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Acrobatics
effect: Draw 2 cards. If you play both this turn, draw 2 more.
flavor: He soars through the air with the greatest of fleas.

name: Aimed Shot
effect: Deal 3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
flavor: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

name: Akama
effect: Stealth Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama Prime' into your deck.
flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
effect: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Aldrachi Warblades
effect: Lifesteal
flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

name: Alliance Bannerman
effect: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

name: Amulet of Undying
effect: Tradeable Resurrect friendly Deathrattle (minion, minions). (Upgrades when Traded!)
flavor: Didn't seem to work out too well for this guy.

name: Animal Companion
effect: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer! Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Anti-Magic Shell
effect: Give your minions +1/+1 and Elusive.
flavor: Using a spell to counter magic - a bit hypocritical don't you think?

name: Apotheosis
effect: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Arcane Intellect
effect: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Arcane Luminary
effect: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (2) less (but not less than 1).
flavor: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

name: Archdruid Naralex
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, add a Dream card to your hand at the end of your turn.
flavor: "Dormant? I think you mean naptime."

name: Archspore Msshi'fn
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
