flavor: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

name: Arid Stormer
effect: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

name: Asphyxiate
effect: Destroy the highest Attack enemy minion.
flavor: I find your abundance of Attack disturbing.

name: Augmented Porcupine
effect: Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

name: Backfire
effect: Draw 3 cards. Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

name: Ball of Spiders
effect: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners with "Deathrattle: Get a random Beast."
flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Banana Vendor
effect: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to each player's hand.
flavor: There's always money in the banana stand.

name: Barrens Trapper
effect: Your Deathrattle cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…

name: Bearshark
effect: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: "Candygram."

name: Blistering Rot
effect: At the end of your turn, summon a Rot with stats equal to this minion's.
flavor: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

name: Bloated Python
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

name: Blood Shard Bristleback
effect: Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavor: I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah) Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah) I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah) So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah) (Take 'em to the Barrens)

name: Bogbeam
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

name: Bogstrok Clacker
effect: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

name: Bonechewer Raider
effect: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

name: Brann Bronzebeard
effect: Your Battlecries trigger twice.
flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

name: Brightwing
effect: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

name: Brilliant Macaw
effect: Battlecry: Repeat the last Battlecry you played.
flavor: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

name: Bronze Explorer
effect: Lifesteal Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Bronze Gatekeeper
effect: Magnetic Taunt
flavor: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

name: Build a Snowman
effect: Summon a 3/3 Snowman that Freezes. Add "Build a Snowbrute" to your hand.
flavor: This is the coolest spell once you get it rolling.

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
effect: Whenever your hero would take damage, this loses 1 Durability instead.
flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: Bunker Sergeant
effect: Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Best hair in the valley.

name: Cargo Guard
effect: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: *Arrrrrmor

name: Carnival Barker
effect: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavor: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Catacomb Guard
effect: Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

name: Ceremonial Maul
effect: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

name: Chaos Leech
effect: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. Outcast: Deal 5 instead.
flavor: Otherwise known as a nematode.

name: Charged Call
effect: Discover a -Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

name: Cheaty Snobold
effect: After an enemy is Frozen, deal 3 damage to it.
flavor: This one will knock you out cold.

name: Chillfallen Baron
effect: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He hates when people call 60 degree weather cold.

name: Cloaked Huntress
effect: Your Secrets cost (0).
flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!

name: Coerce
effect: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

name: Coldlight Seer
effect: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Coldtooth Yeti
effect: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
flavor: Its arrival heralds the Brain Freeze Yeti.

name: Combustion
effect: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Any excess damages both neighbors.
flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Cone of Cold
effect: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Consecration
effect: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

name: Cookie the Cook
effect: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Equip a 2/3 Stirring Rod with Lifesteal.
flavor: Unsurprisingly, "Seafood Surprise" was no one's favorite dish.

name: Coordinated Strike
effect: Summon three 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Copycat
effect: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
flavor: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

name: Counterspell
effect: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Crossroads Gossiper
effect: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Not afraid to spill the tea.

name: Crow's Nest Lookout
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to the left and right-most enemy minions.
flavor: The extra eyes means he sees extra good.

name: Darkglare
effect: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana Crystal.
flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Darkmoon Dirigible
effect: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain Rush.
flavor: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

name: Darkmoon Statue
effect: Your other minions have +1 Attack. Corrupt: This gains +4 Attack.
flavor: As far as workplace injuries go, Silas is protected by his statue of limitations.

name: Day at the Faire
effect: Summon 3 Silver Hand Recruits. Corrupt: Summon 5.
flavor: Karl knew he would someday regret that turkey leg.

name: Deadly Shot
effect: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Death's Head Cultist
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

name: Deathwarden
effect: Deathrattles can't trigger.
flavor: Ride or die takes on a new meaning.

name: Defias Cannoneer
effect: After your hero attacks, deal 2 damage to a random enemy twice.
flavor: "... three."

name: Deliverance
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Honorable Kill: Summon a new 3/3 copy of it.
flavor: In 30 minutes or less, or else it’s free!

name: Demolition Renovator
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy location.
flavor: "Look, the Sire said he wanted something more open concept..."

name: Desecrated Graveyard
effect: At the end of your turn, destroy your lowest Attack minion to summon a 4/4 Shade. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: People are dying to get in.

name: Devouring Ectoplasm
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect.
flavor: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

name: Devouring Plague
effect: Lifesteal. Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

name: Devout Dungeoneer
effect: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Holy spell, reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

name: Direwolf Commander
effect: Honorable Kill: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor: When you’re riding a wolf, it’s in charge and you're allowed to make suggestions.

name: Double Agent
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class, summon a copy of this.
flavor: And under the Alliance tabard? Another Horde tabard.

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
effect: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Dreaded Mount
effect: Give a minion +1/+1. When it dies, summon an endless Dreadsteed.
flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

name: Dreadlord's Bite
effect: Outcast: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: When it gets too dull, it's more of a nibble.

name: Dreaming Drake
effect: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +2/+2.
flavor: Some dragons dream of conquering Azeroth, some just dream of being 5/6s.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
effect: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Educated Elekk
effect: Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

name: Efficient Octo-bot
effect: Frenzy: Reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

name: Enchanted Cauldron
effect: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

name: Enthusiastic Banker
effect: At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.
flavor: She offers 0% interest.

name: Entrapped Sorceress
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, Discover a spell.
flavor: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."

name: Explosive Runes
effect: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Eye Beam
effect: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. Outcast: This costs (1).
flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

name: Faire Arborist
effect: Choose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 2/2 Treant. Corrupt: Do both.
flavor: The bad apple never falls far from the treant.

name: Fairground Fool
effect: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavor: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Fangbound Druid
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
flavor: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

name: Far Sight
effect: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Feat of Strength
effect: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Felrattler
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

name: Felsteel Executioner
effect: Corrupt: Become a weapon.
flavor: "My mom said I could be anything I want."

name: Feral Rage
effect: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

name: Feral Spirit
effect: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Field Contact
effect: After you play a Battlecry or Combo card, draw a card.
flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

name: Fiendish Circle
effect: Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: Firebrand
effect: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Flag Runner
effect: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: I see your argument, but…do you have a flag?

name: Flesheating Ghoul
effect: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name. It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Flightmaster Dungar
effect: Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus when you complete it!
flavor: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.

name: Free Admission
effect: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
effect: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 Elementals that Freeze.
flavor: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

name: Frostwolf Kennels
effect: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: The 1 reason Alliance members defect to the Horde is to adopt a cute frostwolf puppy.

name: Frothing Berserker
effect: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Frozen Shadoweaver
effect: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavor: She still wears her Frozen Shadoweave set despite the many, many nerfs. She just can't let it go!

name: Full-Blown Evil
effect: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: This isn’t your average, everyday evil. This is ADVANCED evil.

name: Fungal Fortunes
effect: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
flavor: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

name: Gan'arg Glaivesmith
effect: Outcast: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When isolation becomes motivation.

name: Gift of Luminance
effect: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Glory Chaser
effect: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
flavor: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

name: Golakka Glutton
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast and gain +1/+1.
flavor: We lost our last cook to one of these.

name: Goody Two-Shields
effect: Divine Shield Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: Gorillabot A-3
effect: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
effect: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavor: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Graveyard Shift
effect: Summon two 1/1 Zombies with Reborn.
flavor: "Why are we even open at night? This place is dead!"

name: Greyheart Sage
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Stealthed minion, draw 2 cards.
flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

name: Grimtotem Bounty Hunter
effect: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy Legendary minion.
flavor: He’ll take a big weight off your shoulders.

name: Guff Runetotem
effect: After you cast a Nature spell, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: "By the twins above and twins below, our companions will lead us through." —Guff Runetotem

name: Gyreworm
effect: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage.
flavor: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

name: Hammer of Wrath
effect: Deal 3 damage. Draw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools. Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Heart of the Wild
effect: Give a minion +2/+2, then give your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: In each of us beats a wild heart. Except the Forsaken.

name: Heavy Plate
effect: Tradeable Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

name: Hellfire
effect: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Hench-Clan Thug
effect: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

name: Hex
effect: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Hog Rancher
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Hog with Rush.
flavor: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.

name: Hold the Bridge
effect: Give a minion +2/+1 and Divine Shield. It gains Lifesteal until end of turn.
flavor: You! Shall not! Pass!

name: Holy Nova
effect: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Horde Operative
effect: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
flavor: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."

name: Horn of Wrathion
effect: Draw a minion. If it's a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: You can count the rings and find out Wrathion's true age.

name: Humongous Razorleaf
effect: Can't attack.
flavor: Loves goblins. In a light cream sauce.

name: Ice Barrier
effect: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Ice Rager
flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

name: Imp Gang Boss
effect: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

name: Impatient Shopkeep
effect: Tradeable Rush
flavor: "Oi! This ain't a museum, lady."

name: Imprisoned Celestial
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. Spellburst: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

name: Imprisoned Observer
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Imprisoned Satyr
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
flavor: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

name: Inconspicuous Rider
effect: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: Injured Blademaster
effect: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Insatiable Felhound
effect: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +1/+1 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Back-to-back winner of the annual hot dog eating contest... and the judge-eating contest.

name: Instructor Fireheart
effect: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Ironbeak Owl
effect: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Ironclad
effect: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavor: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: Jungle Panther
effect: Stealth
flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: K'thir Ritualist
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: Kabal Outfitter
effect: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: Kill Command
effect: Deal 3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.
flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: King Mukla
effect: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Kiri, Chosen of Elune
effect: Battlecry: Add a Solar Eclipse and Lunar Eclipse to your hand.
flavor: Now, when the Sun is between the Moon and the Azeroth... that's when you've got a problem.

name: Kobold Taskmaster
effect: Battlecry: Add 2 Armor Scraps to your hand that give +2 Health to a minion.
flavor: Fabled questgiver of the “Get me candle”, “Get me another candle”, and “Get me 11 more candle” questline.

name: Lady Vashj
effect: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Landscaping
effect: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

name: Lightbringer's Hammer
effect: Lifesteal Can't attack heroes.
flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

name: Lightning Storm
effect: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Lightspawn
effect: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Line Hopper
effect: Your Outcast cards cost (1) less.
flavor: There are two things Demon Hunters know: hopping, and cutting.

name: Lion's Frenzy
effect: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Only as sharp as your draw.

name: Loan Shark
effect: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin. Deathrattle: You get two.
flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

name: Lone Champion
effect: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

name: Lord Barov
effect: Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Luckysoul Hoarder
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck. Corrupt: Draw a card.
flavor: Always brings his own reusable shopping bag, satchel, barrel, trunk, tray, and fluffy pillow.

name: Madame Lazul
effect: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Magehunter
effect: Rush Whenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

name: Magicfin
effect: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

name: Man'ari Mosher
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Mana Tide Totem
effect: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Mankrik
effect: Battlecry: Help Mankrik find his wife! She was last seen somewhere in your deck.
flavor: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.

name: Marshspawn
effect: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, Discover a spell.
flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

name: Master's Call
effect: Discover a minion in your deck. If all 3 are Beasts, draw them all.
flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

name: Mindrender Illucia
effect: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Mini-Mage
effect: Stealth Spell Damage +1
flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

name: Mirror Entity
effect: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Molten Blast
effect: Deal 2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

name: Moontouched Amulet
effect: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Corrupt: And gain 6 Armor.
flavor: The Suntouched Amulet melted.

name: Mor'shan Watch Post
effect: Can't attack. After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/2 Grunt.
flavor: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.

name: Mounted Raptor
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
flavor: Clever girl!

name: Murloc Warleader
effect: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Muster for Battle
effect: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
effect: After you cast a spell, reduce the Cost of a random card in your hand by (1).
flavor: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Netherwind Portal
effect: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Nobleman
effect: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.
flavor: What class are you? 'Upper.'

name: Nofin Can Stop Us
effect: Give your minions +1/+1. Give your Murlocs an extra +1/+1.
flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

name: Northshire Farmer
effect: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies into your deck.
flavor: Dual-classed into Farmer/Rancher.

name: Northwatch Commander
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavor: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Oasis Ally
effect: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Oracle of Elune
effect: After you play a minion that costs (2) or less, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

name: Overconfident Orc
effect: Taunt While at full Health, this has +2 Attack.
flavor: "I am da powerful! You are da poop!"

name: Pack Kodo
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
flavor: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

name: Package Runner
effect: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
flavor: He could go... all... the... way!

name: Palm Reading
effect: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Actual palms not required.

name: Pathmaker
effect: Battlecry: Cast the other choice from the last Choose One spell you've cast. Battlecry:
flavor: You can never choose the wrong path if you make your own.

name: Petting Zoo
effect: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
flavor: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

name: Piggyback Imp
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/1 Imp.
flavor: Imp my ride.

name: Pit Master
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2 Duelist. Corrupt: Summon two.
flavor: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

name: Plague Scientist
effect: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

name: Playmaker
effect: After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy with 1 Health remaining.
flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Popsicooler
effect: Deathrattle: Freeze two random enemy minions.
flavor: Just passing through Alterac on its way to apply for a job at the Ice Cream Citadel.

name: Pride Seeker
effect: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card costs (2) less.
flavor: When you're putting your head in the lion's mouth, you may as well dress the part.

name: Primal Dungeoneer
effect: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Nature spell, also draw an Elemental.
flavor: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

name: Professor Slate
effect: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Psyfiend
effect: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

name: Pyromaniac
effect: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Raid Leader
effect: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Raiding Party
effect: Draw 2 Pirates from your deck. Combo: And a weapon.
flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Ram Tamer
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Stealth.
flavor: Pump up the ram, pump it up. While your hooves are stompin’.

name: Ramming Mount
effect: Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
flavor: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

name: Ratchet Privateer
effect: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

name: Razorfen Beastmaster
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
flavor: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

name: Reflecto Engineer
effect: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
flavor: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

name: Relentless Pursuit
effect: Give your hero +4 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: If you steal a Demon Hunter's corn dog, you'll get what's coming.

name: Revenant Rascal
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavor: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: Revive Pet
effect: Discover a friendly Beast that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: Best friends never really leave.

name: Rigged Faire Game
effect: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: What's faire is fair.

name: Righteous Defense
effect: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
flavor: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

name: Rimefang Sword
effect: After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Those definitely don't rhyme.

name: Rimetongue
effect: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
flavor: Warriors are red, Frost spells are blue, If you're being hit by a weapon, Rimetongue's got you.

name: Robes of Protection
effect: Your minions have Elusive.
flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: Rokara
effect: Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
flavor: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

name: Rustrot Viper
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Poisonous to weapons.

name: Sacrificial Summoner
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: Summoning will cost you an arm and a brother.

name: Saddlemaster
effect: After you play a Beast, add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor: Seat covers. Check. Racing stripes. Check. Cupholder. Check.

name: Saidan the Scarlet
effect: Rush. Whenever this minion gains Attack or Health, double that amount (wherever this is).
flavor: An orc mage accidentally kited him all the way from Stratholme.

name: School Spirits
effect: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Scrapsmith
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Add two 2/4 Grunts with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: Takes the ugly scraps of armor from dead players and combine them into ridiculous looking PVP armor sets.

name: Seedcloud Buckler
effect: Deathrattle: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
effect: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of 2 swords to a test!

name: Serpentshrine Portal
effect: Deal 3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

name: Shadowed Spirit
effect: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.

name: Shadowlight Scholar
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Shan'do Wildclaw
effect: Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

name: Shardshatter Mystic
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

name: Shattering Blast
effect: Destroy all Frozen minions.
flavor: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

name: Shroud of Concealment
effect: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: This page left intentionally blank.

name: SI:7 Agent
effect: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities. Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: SI:7 Operative
effect: Rush After this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

name: SI:7 Smuggler
effect: Battlecry: Summon a random -Cost minion. (Upgraded for each other SI:7 card you have played this game.)
flavor: After a while, Onyxia's regurgitated rats start to taste pretty good.

name: Silvermoon Portal
effect: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?

name: Snowball Fight!
effect: Deal 1 damage to a minion and Freeze it. If it survives, repeat this on another minion!
flavor: Woahwoahwoah, we said no friendly fire!

name: Snowblind Harpy
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Frost spell, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Not snowblind; she can spot a level 51 noob over 40 yards away.

name: Snowed In
effect: Destroy a damaged minion. Freeze all other minions.
flavor: “What do you mean school isn’t cancelled?! It’s a snow day!”

name: Soul of the Forest
effect: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Soulbreaker
effect: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, gain 2 Corpses.
flavor: Two for one special!

name: Southsea Captain
effect: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

name: Sparkjoy Cheat
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Secret, cast it and draw a card.
flavor: "These do NOT spark joy!"

name: Speaker Gidra
effect: Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

name: Spider Tank
flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

name: Stargazer Luna
effect: After you play the right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

name: Stiltstepper
effect: Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Circus school was tough, sometimes you had to step on people to make it to the top.

name: Stonehearth Vindicator
effect: Battlecry: Draw a spell that costs (3) or less. It costs (0) this turn.
flavor: “True strength comes from within your deck” is a whole lot less inspiring.

name: Stoneskin Basilisk
effect: Divine Shield Poisonous
flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

name: Stormpike Aid Station
effect: At the end of your turn, give your minions +2 Health. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Known by some as the “Stormpike Naptime Lounge.”

name: Stormstrike
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When your phone is at 5%.

name: Stormwind Avenger
effect: After you cast a spell on this minion, it gains +2 Attack.
flavor: "I swear if you heal me I will DPS."

name: Stormwind Freebooter
effect: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

name: Stormwind Piper
effect: After this minion attacks, give your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

name: Sunwell Initiate
effect: Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.

name: Swinetusk Shank
effect: After you play a Poison, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Tamsin Roame
effect: Whenever you cast a Shadow spell that costs (1) or more, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavor: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

name: Tar Creeper
effect: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

name: Tavish Stormpike
effect: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

name: Teron Gorefiend
effect: Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
flavor: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

name: Terrorguard Escapee
effect: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your opponent.
flavor: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

name: Ticket Master
effect: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavor: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Tidal Surge
effect: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Totemic Reflection
effect: Give a minion +2/+2. If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Traveling Merchant
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion you control.
flavor: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

name: Two-Faced Investor
effect: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
flavor: Should never have opened that joint account...

name: Unbound Elemental
effect: After you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Underlight Angling Rod
effect: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Venomous Scorpid
effect: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."

name: Vile Call
effect: Summon two 2/2 Demons with Lifesteal.
flavor: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

name: Void Terror
effect: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Voracious Reader
effect: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
effect: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Vulpera Toxinblade
effect: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

name: War Cache
effect: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
flavor: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.

name: Warhorse Trainer
effect: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +2 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off. Every day he's hostling.

name: Warmaul Challenger
effect: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Battle it to the death!
flavor: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

name: Warsong Commander
effect: After you summon another minion, give it Rush.
flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Water Moccasin
effect: Stealth Has Poisonous while you have no other minions.
flavor: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
effect: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hogger's most hated attraction.

name: Whelp Bonker
effect: Frenzy and Honorable Kill: Draw a card.
flavor: Bonk!

name: Wild Growth
effect: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Wrathscale Naga
effect: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Ymirjar Deathbringer
effect: Taunt. Deathrattle: Spend 3 Corpses to summon a 3/3 Risen Ymirjar with Taunt.
flavor: Purple cotton candy is the snack of choice in Ymirheim.

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor Prime' into your deck.
flavor: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Zola the Gorgon
effect: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

name: Apothecary Helbrim
effect: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
flavor: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

name: Arcane Brilliance
effect: Add a copy of a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost spell in your deck to your hand.
flavor: They could probably do with a dash of Arcane Humility.

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
effect: Taunt Lifesteal
flavor: Demons have destroyed the lives of the Ashtongue draenei. Now he’s got a shoulder-axe to grind.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin. Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Assassinate
effect: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Auspicious Spirits
effect: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
flavor: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

name: Axe Berserker
effect: Rush. Honorable Kill: Draw a weapon.
flavor: All the body spray went to her head.

name: Balloon Merchant
effect: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Baron Rivendare
effect: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

name: Barricade
effect: Summon a 2/4 Guard with Taunt. If it's your only minion, summon another.
flavor: The Alliance and Horde join forces to enforce the fire safety capacity.

name: Big Game Hunter
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Blacksmithing Hammer
effect: Tradeable After you Trade this, gain +2 Durability.
flavor: Passed through the hands of countless smiths, and eventually the skulls of their enemies.

name: Blademaster Samuro
effect: Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavor: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

name: Blessing of Kings
effect: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Bloodhoof Brave
effect: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it. He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
effect: Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Bru'kan
effect: Nature Spell Damage +3
flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.

name: Burrowing Scorpid
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If that kills the target, gain Stealth.
flavor: It's a game of hide and go sting.

name: Cabal Acolyte
effect: Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

name: Canal Slogger
effect: Rush, Lifesteal Overload: (1)
flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

name: Cariel Roame
effect: Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

name: Cascading Disaster
effect: Destroy a random enemy minion. Corrupt: Destroy 2. Corrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavor: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Cheesemonger
effect: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a random spell with the same Cost to your hand.
flavor: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Circus Amalgam
effect: Taunt This has all minion types.
flavor: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Circus Medic
effect: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

name: Cloak of Shadows
effect: Give your hero Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

name: Counterfeit Blade
effect: Battlecry: Get a copy of a random friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game.
flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

name: Crimson Hothead
effect: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Crossroads Watch Post
effect: Can't attack. Whenever your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.

name: Crusader Aura
effect: Whenever a friendly minion attacks, give it +2/+1. Lasts turns.
flavor: Also makes your animations 20% faster.

name: Dark Alley Pact
effect: Summon a Fiend with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
effect: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore. Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Darkspear Berserker
effect: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

name: Death Strike
effect: Lifesteal Deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavor: A little embarrassing when used on large minions.

name: Deepwater Evoker
effect: Battlecry: Draw a spell. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: "Cap'n! We've hit an iceberg! ...No, it’s not my fault!"

name: Defender of Argus
effect: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

name: Demonic Assault
effect: Deal 3 damage. Summon two 1/3 Voidwalkers with Taunt.
flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

name: Dire Frenzy
effect: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

name: Dire Frostwolf
effect: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor: Tips to survive a frostwolf attack: -Stay calm -Lay down -Drizzle steak sauce over your body Brought to you by the Frostwolf Council for Alliance Safety.

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
effect: After you play a minion, destroy it and summon a 4/4 Failed Student.
flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

name: Disguised Wanderer
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavor: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Divine Rager
effect: Divine Shield
flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

name: Draenei Totemcarver
effect: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

name: Dragonbane
effect: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Drakonid Operative
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

name: Dread Corsair
effect: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Drek'Thar
effect: Battlecry: If this costs more than every minion in your deck, summon one of those minions.
flavor: Inside your deck there are two wolves. One is a frostwolf. The other is a frostwolf. You are a Frostwolf.

name: Dun Baldar Bridge
effect: After you summon a minion, give it +2/+2. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.

name: Dunk Tank
effect: Deal 4 damage. Corrupt: Then deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

name: Earth Revenant
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

name: Eater of Secrets
effect: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap. You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

name: Edwin, Defias Kingpin
effect: Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, gain +2/+2 and repeat this effect.
flavor: He’s not going to tear down the walls of Stormwind sitting around in the Hall of Fame.

name: Elise Starseeker
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

name: Elven Minstrel
effect: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Escaped Manasaber
effect: Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

name: Fal'dorei Strider
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

name: Fandral Staghelm
effect: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

name: Fantastic Firebird
effect: Windfury
flavor: The original flaming chicken.

name: Felfin Navigator
effect: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavor: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Felgorger
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The 'everything green' diet.

name: Felsaber
effect: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
flavor: Some drivers rev their engines. This one growls all on its own.

name: Fire Breather
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Fire Sale
effect: Tradeable Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

name: Fireball
effect: Deal 6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Firemancer Flurgl
effect: After you play a Murloc, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: First Blade of Wrynn
effect: Divine Shield Battlecry: Gain Rush if this has at least 4 Attack.
flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

name: Fishy Flyer
effect: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Like a fish out of water.

name: Flanking Maneuver
effect: Summon a 4/2 Demon with Rush. If it dies this turn, summon another.
flavor: So, do we have advantage? Can I sneak attack?

name: Footman
effect: Taunt Adjacent minions are Immune while attacking.
flavor: Ha ha HAAAH huHAH!

name: Frostwolf Warmaster
effect: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: “The spoils of war ain’t free… Unless you’re me!”

name: Frozen Mammoth
effect: This is Frozen until you cast a Fire spell.
flavor: *record scratch* "So, you may be wondering how I got here."

name: Gear Grubber
effect: Taunt. If you end your turn with any unspent Mana, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
flavor: Yeah, “for off-spec,” suuuuure.

name: Germination
effect: Summon a copy of a friendly minion. Give the copy Taunt.
flavor: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

name: Glide
effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

name: Granite Forgeborn
effect: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Grave Strength
effect: Give your minions +1 Attack. Spend 5 Corpses to give them +3 instead.
flavor: They're just standing there… MENACINGLY!

name: Grim Necromancer
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

name: Groundskeeper
effect: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

name: Gruntled Patron
effect: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.

name: Guild Trader
effect: Tradeable Spell Damage +2
flavor: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
effect: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Herald of Lokholar
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell.
flavor: “I don’t care how hot it is. I am not going over there to be your air conditioning."

name: High Abbess Alura
effect: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
effect: Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Houndmaster Shaw
effect: Your other minions have Rush.
flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

name: Hullbreaker
effect: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Your hero takes damage equal to its Cost.
flavor: Breaks through the hard shell to reach the ship's gooey interior.

name: Hysteria
effect: Choose an enemy minion. It attacks random minions until it dies.
flavor: "My mount and I share a special connection. Just not a good one."

name: Ice Revenant
effect: Whenever you cast a Frost spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: There must have been some magic in that old ice mace we found.

name: Il'gynoth
effect: Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
flavor: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

name: Incanter's Flow
effect: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by (1).
flavor: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Infiltrator Lilian
effect: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Injured Marauder
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Invigorating Sermon
effect: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Kargath Bladefist
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavor: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Kayn Sunfury
effect: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavor: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
effect: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

name: Knife Vendor
effect: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

name: Kodo Mount
effect: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
flavor: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

name: Korrak the Bloodrager
effect: Deathrattle: If this wasn't Honorably Killed, resummon Korrak.
flavor: “I live, I love, I slay, and I am undying.”

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
effect: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
effect: Battlecry: Attack the left and right-most enemy minions. Outcast: Immune this turn.
flavor: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

name: Lakkari Felhound
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
effect: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavor: A purple stone Azari carved For dark hearts, craving, power-starved. The first to bow, the warlock Rin, Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Lifedrinker
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavor: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Lightmaw Netherdrake
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Holy and a Shadow spell, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Do you think it's a glass half full kind of Netherdrake, or a glass half empty, inescapable void kind of Netherdrake?

name: Lightsteed
effect: Your healing effects also give affected minions +2 Health.
flavor: All the steed, half the calories.

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
effect: Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Magtheridon
effect: Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
flavor: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
effect: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

name: Marked Shot
effect: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Discover a spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Marrowslicer
effect: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

name: Metamorphosis
effect: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 5 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Might of Menethil
effect: Battlecry: Spend up to 3 Corpses. Freeze that many enemy minions.
flavor: Menethil's Might, at night, fights the light, not quite the blight, right?

name: Mok'Nathal Lion
effect: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
flavor: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

name: Monstrous Parrot
effect: Battlecry: Get a copy of the last friendly Deathrattle minion that died.
flavor: What kind of crackers are you feeding that thing?

name: Multicaster
effect: Battlecry: Draw a card for each different spell school you've cast this game. ( )
flavor: Has a questionable talent tree.

name: Najak Hexxen
effect: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Give the minion back.
flavor: "I've got friends on the other side... of the battlefield."

name: Nerubian Swarmguard
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Summon two copies of this minion.
flavor: How long can this go on? Apparently even in death.

name: Nightshade Matron
effect: Rush Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Nordrassil Druid
effect: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
flavor: The World Tree Nordrassil provides life-giving energy to the world--and excellent mana savings.

name: Oaken Summons
effect: Gain 6 Armor. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (4) or less.
flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Occult Conjurer
effect: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavor: Days since last accident: 0

name: Onyxian Drake
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.
flavor: The best offense is a great defense.

name: Outrider's Axe
effect: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Overgrowth
effect: Gain two empty Mana Crystals.
flavor: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Park Panther
effect: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Persistent Peddler
effect: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
flavor: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

name: Piercing Shot
effect: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
effect: After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, summon a new copy of it without Taunt.
flavor: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!

name: Potion of Illusion
effect: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Power Infusion
effect: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Pride's Fury
effect: Give your minions +1/+3.
flavor: Day 4: I think they're starting to suspect.

name: Raging Felscreamer
effect: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Raid Negotiator
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Choose One card. It has both effects combined.
flavor: "What do you mean by aggressive negotiation tactics?" "Negotiations in bear form."

name: Rally!
effect: Resurrect a friendly 1-Cost, 2-Cost, and 3-Cost minion.
flavor: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

name: Rancor
effect: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Gain 2 Armor for each destroyed.
flavor: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Razorglaive Sentinel
effect: After you play the left or right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: For the worgen that has everything: more claws.

name: Reaper's Scythe
effect: Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.
flavor: Die. Die. Die.

name: Reckless Apprentice
effect: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavor: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Remorseless Winter
effect: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Draw a card.
flavor: In the Badlands, this is a Rare.

name: Remote-Controlled Golem
effect: After this takes damage, shuffle two Golem Parts into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Mech.
flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

name: Renowned Performer
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Assistants with Taunt.
flavor: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

name: Replicat-o-tron
effect: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavor: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Replicating Menace
effect: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavor: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Repulsive Gargantuan
effect: Enemy characters can't be healed.
flavor: "EW, YUCK, GROSS, ICKY-" "Stop, you're hurting my feelings!"

name: Ring Toss
effect: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
flavor: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

name: Rinling's Rifle
effect: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

name: Rodent Nest
effect: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

name: Royal Librarian
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: Rustsworn Cultist
effect: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Demon."
flavor: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
effect: Combo: The next two cards you play this turn cost (3) less.
flavor: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

name: Scrap Shot
effect: Deal 3 damage. Give a random Beast in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
effect: Taunt
flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
effect: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Shifty Sophomore
effect: Stealth Spellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavor: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: SI:7 Informant
effect: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other SI:7 card you've played this game.
flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

name: Sin'dorei Scentfinder
effect: Frenzy: Summon four 1/1 Hyenas with Rush.
flavor: Loves candles. Hates deodorant.

name: Siphon Soul
effect: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Sketchy Information
effect: Draw a Deathrattle card that costs (4) or less. Trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

name: Soul Rend
effect: Deal 5 damage to all minions. Destroy a card in your deck for each killed.
flavor: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

name: Southsea Scoundrel
effect: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.
flavor: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."

name: Spectral Cutlass
effect: Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Spice Bread Baker
effect: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
flavor: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.

name: Spirit Alpha
effect: After you play a card with Overload, summon a 2/3 Spirit Wolf with Taunt.
flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

name: Spirit Healer
effect: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

name: Spring the Trap
effect: Deal 3 damage to a minion and cast a Secret from your deck. Honorable Kill: Cast 2.
flavor: Talk about starting off on the wrong foot.

name: Stand Against Darkness
effect: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Star Student Stelina
effect: Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

name: Stealer of Souls
effect: The first card you draw each turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

name: Steeldancer
effect: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Stormpike Battle Ram
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Your next Beast costs (2) less.
flavor: Baa ram ewe! To your dwarves, your beard, Stormpike clan be true!

name: Stormpike Marshal
effect: Taunt If you took 5 or more damage on your opponent's turn, this costs (1).
flavor: The Stormpike have a very direct take on life insurance.

name: Stubborn Suspect
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

name: Suckerhook
effect: At the end of your turn, transform your weapon into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: A moderately better dining companion than Suckerbeard.

name: Sunwing Squawker
effect: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast on a friendly minion on this.
flavor: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

name: Sword Eater
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Equip a 3/2 Sword.
flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: Tamsin's Phylactery
effect: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Give your minions its Deathrattle.
flavor: Eau de Morte. Guaranteed to take your date’s breath away

name: Thassarian
effect: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: A natural born leader. And an unnatural reborn leader.

name: The Black Knight
effect: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: The Dark Portal
effect: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: The Nameless One
effect: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavor: Used to be called " , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Thickhide Kodo
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Tomb Pillager
effect: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

name: Torrent
effect: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you cast a spell last turn.
flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Tower Sergeant
effect: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Best helmet in the valley.

name: Truesilver Champion
effect: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 3 Health to it.
flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Twilight Drake
effect: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
effect: Battlecry: If this costs less than every minion in your deck, reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: His favorite modes of transportation? Van, car, board, bike.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
effect: Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavor: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Vengeful Spirit
effect: Outcast: Draw 2 Deathrattle minions.
flavor: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

name: Venomstrike Bow
effect: Poisonous
flavor: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

name: Veteran Warmedic
effect: After you cast a Holy spell, summon a 2/2 Medic with Lifesteal.
flavor: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Vilefiend Trainer
effect: Outcast: Summon two 1/1 Demons.
flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

name: Violet Teacher
effect: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Vivid Spores
effect: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Void Flayer
effect: Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

name: Void Shard
effect: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage.
flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Voidcaller
effect: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor: "Void! Here, void! Here, buddy!"

name: Warden of Chains
effect: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Demon that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+2.
flavor: Can’t stay out too late. I gotta head back home to the ol’ ball and chained demon.

name: Warsong Outrider
effect: Rush
flavor: When it comes to the Warsong clan, outriders are the insiders.

name: Warsong Wrangler
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever they are).
flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

name: Water Elemental
effect: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

name: Whirling Combatant
effect: Battlecry and Frenzy: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

name: Wildpaw Cavern
effect: At the end of your turn, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Adventurers were quite confused when they saw how many boots were frozen to the ceiling.

name: Wing Commander Mulverick
effect: Rush. Your minions have "Honorable Kill: Summon a 2/2 Wyvern with Rush."
flavor: “A board full of 2-Health minions? This is what I call a target rich environment.”

name: Wretched Tutor
effect: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Wyrm Weaver
effect: Spellburst: Summon two 1/2 Mana Wyrms.
flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Xyrella
effect: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Aegwynn, the Guardian
effect: Spell Damage +2 Deathrattle: The next minion you draw inherits these powers.
flavor: With Medivh as her son, nothing YOU do could ever disappoint her.

name: Against All Odds
effect: Destroy ALL odd-Attack minions.
flavor: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

name: Al'ar
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
flavor: Week 679: Still no mount...

name: Aldor Truthseeker
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavor: It’s under 'T.'

name: Amber Watcher
effect: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health.
flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Apexis Blast
effect: Deal 5 damage. If your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

name: Arbor Up
effect: Summon two 2/2 Treants. Give your minions +2/+1.
flavor: If you can’t outrun a tree, you really shouldn’t be here anyway.

name: Arcane Overflow
effect: Deal 8 damage to an enemy minion. Summon a Remnant with stats equal to the excess damage.
flavor: On this ship, when you can’t use an int, learn how to float.

name: Army of the Dead
effect: Raise up to 5 Corpses as 2/2 Risen Ghouls with Rush.
flavor: Yesterday's army, today.

name: Azure Drake
effect: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

name: Barak Kodobane
effect: Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, and 3-Cost spell.
flavor: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Barrens Blacksmith
effect: Frenzy: Give your other minions +2/+2.
flavor: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."

name: Blessing of Authority
effect: Give a minion +8/+8. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: Blood Guard
effect: Whenever this minion takes damage, give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor: Has never donated blood and doesn’t plan on ever doing so.

name: Blood Herald
effect: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

name: Bloodlust
