effect: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Boggspine Knuckles
effect: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

name: Boomkin
effect: Choose One - Restore 8 Health to your hero; or Deal 4 damage.
flavor: Some Druids consider balance to be a state of harmony between the Natural and the Arcane. Others are more focused on the balance of the opponent’s life total versus their own.

name: Brawl
effect: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Burning Blade Acolyte
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/8 Demonspawn with Taunt.
flavor: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.

name: Cannonmaster Smythe
effect: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
flavor: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

name: Carousel Gryphon
effect: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Cavalry Horn
effect: Deathrattle: Summon the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: The clarion call of the Alliance skipping every objective and going straight to Drek’thar.

name: Cera'thine Fleetrunner
effect: Battlecry: Replace your minions in hand and deck with ones from other classes. They cost (2) less.
flavor: World Record CTF Champion 16 years running.

name: Chaos Nova
effect: Deal 4 damage to all minions.
flavor: Illin' Illidan laying down the damage, flinging out the chaos as far as he can manage.

name: Cobalt Scalebane
effect: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

name: Contraband Stash
effect: Replay 5 cards from other classes you've played this game.
flavor: “Coggsprocket! We happy?" "Yeah, we happy."

name: Corpse Bride
effect: Battlecry: Spend up to 10 Corpses. Summon a Risen Groom with stats equal to the amount spent.
flavor: Until undeath do us part.

name: Corpse Explosion
effect: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavor: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Cutting Class
effect: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Darius Crowley
effect: Rush After this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
effect: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt and Corrupted cards in your hand and deck by (2).
flavor: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

name: Darkbishop Benedictus
effect: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Return this to your hand. It costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: '"In hindsight, maybe I should have let the Alliance have all the fun back at the Wrathgate."

name: Deck of Chaos
effect: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in your deck.
flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

name: Deep Breath
effect: Deal damage to a minion and its neighbors. (Improved by number of other spells in your hand.)
flavor: I SAID "RELAX!"

name: Defias Blastfisher
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each of your Beasts.
flavor: She's a dynamite fishing trainer.

name: Derailed Coaster
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
flavor: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

name: Doctor Krastinov
effect: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Don't Stand in the Fire!
effect: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Apparently the “Caution: Hot Surface” sign had burned up.

name: Doomguard
effect: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Doomhammer
effect: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall. His name is a total coincidence.

name: Dyn-o-matic
effect: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions except Mechs.
flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

name: Earth Elemental
effect: Taunt Overload: (2)
flavor: Nothing beats rock.

name: Envoy Rustwix
effect: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 random Prime Legendary minions into your deck.
flavor: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Ethereal Conjurer
effect: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

name: Faceless Manipulator
effect: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Felfire in the Hole!
effect: Draw a spell and deal 2 damage to all enemies. If it's a Fel spell, deal 1 more.
flavor: Fear not, feebleminded friends, for failure to fell your foes with felfire is fundamentally farfetched!

name: Felsoul Jailer
effect: Battlecry: Your opponent discards a minion. Deathrattle: Return it.
flavor: He can lock 'em up, but he just can't keep 'em.

name: Firework Elemental
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
flavor: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
effect: Rush Corrupt: Gain +4/+4.
flavor: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

name: Force of Nature
effect: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Fortune Teller
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Frantic Hippogryph
effect: Rush. Honorable Kill: Gain Windfury.
flavor: It's killed and it'll kill again!

name: Glowfly Swarm
effect: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

name: Gold Road Grunt
effect: Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.
flavor: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

name: Greybough
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
flavor: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Gurubashi Berserker
effect: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
effect: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

name: Hollow Abomination
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Honorable Kill: Gain the minion's Attack.
flavor: As soon as you land your first Honorable Kill, trust me, you'll be hooked!

name: Imported Tarantula
effect: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

name: Imprisoned Antaen
effect: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

name: Inara Stormcrash
effect: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Jandice Barov
effect: Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies when it takes damage.
flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Justicar Trueheart
effect: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Keywarden Ivory
effect: Battlecry: Discover a Dual Class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
flavor: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

name: Knight-Captain
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Gain +3/+3.
flavor: Very dangerous shoulder-to-ears situation here.

name: Lake Thresher
effect: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" "That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Leeroy Jenkins
effect: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
effect: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavor: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Libram of Justice
effect: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Lilypad Lurker
effect: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Lion's Guard
effect: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
effect: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Lyra the Sunshard
effect: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

name: Malevolent Strike
effect: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each card in your deck that didn't start there.
flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

name: Menagerie Warden
effect: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

name: Mind Control Tech
effect: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one.
flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

name: Mistrunner
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Overload: (1)
flavor: "Get IT off me!!!"

name: Moonfang
effect: Can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavor: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

name: Mor'shan Elite
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, summon a copy of this.
flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
effect: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Need for Greed
effect: Tradeable Draw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).
flavor: Sorry guys, I TOTALLY meant to click greed.

name: Neeru Fireblade
effect: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

name: Night Elf Huntress
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to three different enemies. (You pick the targets!)
flavor: A triple threat, all on her own.

name: Nourish
effect: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Ogremancer
effect: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Onyxian Warder
effect: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

name: Optimistic Ogre
effect: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavor: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Overlord Runthak
effect: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand.
flavor: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.

name: Pet Collector
effect: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck that costs (5) or less.
flavor: "And I'll call you Mrs. Snugglepants, and you Bubblecuddle, and you Cutie Cakes, and you ..."

name: Possessifier
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Fighters with Rush and Reborn.
flavor: Beating the best, being the best, and brainwashing the rest.

name: Priest of An'she
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

name: Protect the Innocent
effect: Summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt. If your hero was healed this turn, summon another.
flavor: "Quick, strike a super hero pose!"

name: Psyche Split
effect: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Ras Frostwhisper
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Razormane Raider
effect: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

name: Refreshing Spring Water
effect: Draw 2 cards. Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Rime Sculptor
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Rime Elementals with "Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy."
flavor: Also known as a Rapper.

name: Ringmaster Whatley
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Rotten Applebaum
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

name: Runed Mithril Rod
effect: After you draw 4 cards, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1). Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

name: Ruststeed Raider
effect: Taunt, Rush Battlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Sanctum Chandler
effect: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

name: Scrap Golem
effect: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
effect: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.

name: Shady Bartender
effect: Tradeable Battlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

name: Shattered Rumbler
effect: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

name: Shieldmaiden
effect: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

name: Sigil of Reckoning
effect: At the start of your next turn, summon a random Demon from your hand.
flavor: “It’s dangerous ‘round these parts, I reckon.”

name: Snowfall Graveyard
effect: Your Deathrattles trigger twice. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Live fast, die twice.

name: Soulshard Lapidary
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

name: Spammy Arcanist
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this.
flavor: You don't have to jump while spamming, but it’s more fun that way.

name: Spawn of Deathwing
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Discard a random card.
flavor: Aww, who’s the most dangerous threat to the world? You are!

name: Spirit Guide
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell and a Shadow spell.
flavor: "Hey Jake." "Back again?" "Yup." "See you in 2 minutes."

name: Sprint
effect: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Steward of Scrolls
effect: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: Stonemaul Anchorman
effect: Rush Frenzy: Draw a card.
flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

name: Stormwind Guard
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: 1% Guarding, 99% providing directions.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
effect: Stealth
flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Taelan Fordring
effect: Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw your highest Cost minion.
flavor: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.

name: Teacher's Pet
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: Temple Enforcer
effect: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Tent Trasher
effect: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

name: The Rat King
effect: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: Totem Goliath
effect: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Trampling Rhino
effect: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Twilight Runner
effect: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Vectus
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Void Drinker
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: It has no taste.

name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
effect: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

name: Waste Warden
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
flavor: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

name: Wealth Redistributor
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Attack of the highest and lowest Attack minion.
flavor: WOULD YE LIKE CASH BACK? [ ] YAR HAR [ ] YO HO

name: Wildheart Guff
effect: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana to 20. Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Draw a card.
flavor: Guff faced his biggest challenge yet: making friends on a battlefield.

name: Wildpaw Gnoll
effect: Rush Costs (1) less for each non-Rogue Class card added to your hand this game.
flavor: A big fan of four-claw discounts.

name: Zai, the Incredible
effect: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Anetheron
effect: Costs (1) if your hand is full.
flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

name: Armagedillo
effect: Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Balinda Stonehearth
effect: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells. Swap their Costs with this minion's stats.
flavor: Imagine her surprise, ending up in a game called Hearthstone.

name: Barrens Scavenger
effect: Taunt Costs (1) while your deck has 10 or fewer cards.
flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

name: Battleground Battlemaster
effect: Adjacent minions have Windfury.
flavor: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

name: Beaststalker Tavish
effect: Battlecry: Discover and cast 2 Improved Secrets.
flavor: Tavish left home to forge his own path. But it still led him back to Alterac to kick some Frostwolf butt.

name: Best in Shell
effect: Tradeable Summon two 2/7 Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: The agility course takes a while.

name: Bladed Lady
effect: Rush Costs (1) if your hero has 6 or more Attack.
flavor: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

name: Blizzard
effect: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Captain Galvangar
effect: Battlecry: If you have gained 15 or more Armor this game, gain +3/+3 and Charge. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavor: It wasn't the ravages of war that took Galvangar, it was hypothermia.

name: Caria Felsoul
effect: Battlecry: Transform into a 6/6 copy of a Demon in your deck.
flavor: This is what happens when you keep taking the advice of the little demon on your shoulder.

name: City Architect
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 0/5 Castle Walls with Taunt.
flavor: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

name: Claw Machine
effect: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
flavor: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

name: Coldarra Drake
effect: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Cornelius Roame
effect: At the start and end of each player's turn, draw a card.
flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

name: Corrupted Ashbringer
effect: Lifesteal
flavor: Put your faith in the blight!

name: Cowardly Grunt
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

name: Devout Pupil
effect: Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
flavor: "I will find you, sky!"

name: Dread Infernal
effect: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Dreadlich Tamsin
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle 3 Rifts into your deck. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: At a certain point, you stop mocking death and start becoming it.

name: Druid of the Claw
effect: Choose One - Transform into a 7/6 with Rush; or a 4/9 with Taunt.
flavor: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Entitled Customer
effect: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

name: Evasive Wyrm
effect: Rush Divine Shield Elusive
flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Fel Summoner
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your hand.
flavor: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

name: Felwalker
effect: Taunt. Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost Fel spell from your hand.
flavor: How it feels to chew Fel Gum.

name: Fire Elemental
effect: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Flik Skyshiv
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Floecaster
effect: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

name: Forest Warden Omu
effect: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

name: Frostmourne
effect: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.
flavor: Death Nights, Frost Morn, what's next - Blood Noon?

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
effect: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Glaciate
effect: Discover an 8-Cost minion. Summon and Freeze it.
flavor: We now have a more accurate answer to the age-old question "What's cooler than being cool?"

name: Gnome Muncher
effect: Taunt, Lifesteal At the end of your turn, attack the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: Gnom gnom gnom.

name: Gnomelia, S.A.F.E. Pilot
effect: Rush. Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Never learned how to L.A.N.D.

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
effect: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Grey Sage Parrot
effect: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast that costs (6) or more.
flavor: Nothing is more terrifying than a parrot squawking "Pyroblast!"

name: Hammer of the Naaru
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Hand of Gul'dan
effect: When you play or discard this, draw 3 cards.
flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
effect: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Highlord Fordragon
effect: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

name: Icehoof Protector
effect: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: I can't feel my axe!

name: Impfestation
effect: Summon a 3/3 Dread Imp to attack each enemy minion.
flavor: Call the imp-sterminator!

name: Initiation
effect: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Judicious Junior
effect: Lifesteal
flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
effect: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavor: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
effect: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
effect: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
flavor: Never should have flushed him.

name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
effect: Battlecry: Summon two /4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)
flavor: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel

name: Lady Anacondra
effect: Your Nature spells cost (2) less.
flavor: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

name: Lady Prestor
effect: Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
flavor: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

name: Legionnaire
effect: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: *not related to the Burning Legion

name: Lightbomb
effect: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Lightshower Elemental
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Marrow Manipulator
effect: Battlecry: Spend up to 5 Corpses. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy for each.
flavor: Also buffs your Calcium by 1000mg.

name: Maxima Blastenheimer
effect: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your deck. It attacks the enemy hero, then dies.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

name: Mi'da, Pure Light
effect: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle a Fragment into your deck that resummons Mi'da when drawn.
flavor: Unfortunately, Mi’da’s touch will not turn things to gold.

name: Mossy Horror
effect: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

name: Onyx Magescribe
effect: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Overseer Frigidara
effect: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells. If they're both Frost spells, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Is your refrigidarator is running?

name: Proving Grounds
effect: Summon two minions from your deck. They fight!
flavor: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
effect: Summon seven 1/1 Rats. Any that can't fit on the battlefield go to your hand with +4/+4.
flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

name: Reno Jackson
effect: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

name: Ring Matron
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.
flavor: But where does she keep them?

name: Runic Carvings
effect: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

name: Savannah Highmane
effect: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
effect: Battlecry: Draw (card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Scavenging Shivarra
effect: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all other minions.
flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

name: Skull of Gul'dan
effect: Draw 3 cards. Outcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

name: Smug Senior
effect: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a 5/7 Ghost with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

name: Snowfall Guardian
effect: Battlecry: Freeze all other minions.
flavor: You’re finally awake! That fall looked really bad. Demon Hunters? Mercenaries? What are you talking about? Come on, I just unpacked a Golden Moorabi, let’s go build a Freeze Shaman deck.

name: Sorcerous Substitute
effect: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

name: Spikeridged Steed
effect: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Taurajo Brave
effect: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

name: The Lurker Below
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: Thing from Below
effect: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Tickatus
effect: Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Tiny Toys
effect: Summon four random 5-Cost minions. Make them 2/2.
flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Undying Disciple
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavor: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

name: Abyssal Enforcer
effect: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

name: Ancient of Lore
effect: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 7 Health.
flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Ancient of War
effect: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?" You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Baron Geddon
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Barrens Stablehand
effect: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavor: It’s never Huffer.

name: Bearon Gla'shear
effect: Battlecry: For each Frost spell you've cast this game, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. ( )
flavor: When you get hit by a royally bad pun, you just have to grin and bear it.

name: Bloodboil Brute
effect: Rush Costs (1) less for each damaged minion.
flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

name: Bonechewer Vanguard
effect: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

name: Catrina Muerte
effect: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Clumsy Courier
effect: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

name: Commencement
effect: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Cursed Vagrant
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

name: Cycle of Hatred
effect: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

name: Darkmoon Tonk
effect: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
effect: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
flavor: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

name: Dr. Boom
effect: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

name: Druid of the Plains
effect: Rush Frenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
flavor: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

name: Elekk Mount
effect: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

name: Enslaved Fel Lord
effect: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.

name: Expendable Performers
effect: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If they all die this turn, summon seven more.
flavor: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

name: Fel Guardians
effect: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a friendly minion dies.
flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

name: Firelands Portal
effect: Deal 6 damage. Summon a random 6-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Flamereaper
effect: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero attacks.
flavor: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

name: Flamestrike
effect: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Frostsaber Matriarch
effect: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Beast you've summoned this game.
flavor: They say “don’t poke the bear”, but they NEVER said “don’t poke the frostsaber or her cubs”.

name: Frostwyrm's Fury
effect: Deal 5 damage. Freeze all enemy minions. Summon a 5/5 Frostwyrm.
flavor: Terrible destruction, but minty fresh breath!

name: Gorehowl
effect: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe. Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession. Quite the mystery!

name: Guardian Animals
effect: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

name: Guardian of Kings
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Humongous Owl
effect: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: "Humongous what?" -Torug's last words.

name: Irebound Brute
effect: Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
flavor: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
effect: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: Kargal Battlescar
effect: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've summoned this game.
flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.

name: Keymaster Alabaster
effect: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Lady Liadrin
effect: Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
effect: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

name: Libram of Judgment
effect: Corrupt: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: You really can't judge a book by its cover.

name: Lothar
effect: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

name: Magister Dawngrasp
effect: Battlecry: Recast a spell from each spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: Magister is a humble title for one who united warring armies against the greatest threat to Azeroth.

name: Marsh Hydra
effect: Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
flavor: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

name: Mask of C'Thun
effect: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

name: Mass Polymorph
effect: Transform all minions into 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: Sheep in Frostwolves' clothing.

name: Mountain Bear
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 2/4 Cubs with Taunt.
flavor: If they want your picnic basket, I recommend giving it to them.

name: Mr. Smite
effect: Your Pirates have Charge.
flavor: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

name: Mutanus the Devourer
effect: Battlecry: Eat a minion in your opponent's hand. Gain its stats.
flavor: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
effect: Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns are only 15 seconds long.
flavor: Live life in the fast lane. As long as your opponent does too.

name: Overlord Saurfang
effect: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

name: Party Up!
effect: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

name: Patchwerk
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a random minion in your opponent's hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: This card is so good, it might need patch work.

name: Priestess of Fury
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

name: Rokara, the Valorous
effect: Battlecry: Equip a 5/2 Unstoppable Force.
flavor: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.

name: Scale of Onyxia
effect: Fill your board with 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Whelp for scale.

name: Selfless Sidekick
effect: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
flavor: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

name: SI:7 Assassin
effect: Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

name: Siamat
effect: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Silas Darkmoon
effect: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavor: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Skeletal Dragon
effect: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a Dragon to your hand.
flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Soul Mirror
effect: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Soulciologist Malicia
effect: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush. ( )
flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Stormwatcher
effect: Windfury
flavor: Aspiring meteorologist!

name: Stormwind Champion
effect: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Strongman
effect: Taunt Corrupt: This costs (0).
flavor: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Tess Greymane
effect: Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: Umbral Owl
effect: Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavor: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Abominable Lieutenant
effect: At the end of your turn, eat a random enemy minion and gain its stats.
flavor: If you can't join 'em, eat 'em.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
effect: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Arcane Devourer
effect: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Archwitch Willow
effect: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
effect: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

name: Brasswing
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies. Honorable Kill: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: I’ve seen this before. You just have to time it right to avoid the dragon.

name: Bru'kan of the Elements
effect: Battlecry: Call upon the power of two Elements!
flavor: The elements crackled through Bru'kan's veins and his life flashed before his eyes. He knew this moment would come, but he wondered, had he given them enough?

name: Celestial Alignment
effect: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
flavor: "Is my deck any good?" "I mean, if the stars align."

name: Cenarion Ward
effect: Gain 8 Armor. Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavor: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

name: Cenarius
effect: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Coilfang Warlord
effect: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
flavor: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
effect: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Deep Freeze
effect: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Deviate Dreadfang
effect: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
flavor: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: G'huun the Blood God
effect: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Goliath, Sneed's Masterpiece
effect: Battlecry: Fire five rockets at enemy minions that deal 2 damage each. (You pick the targets!)
flavor: “Listen, this baby has blades, rockets, and rocket blades. Only thing it doesn’t have is good gas mileage.”

name: Grand Finale
effect: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: Grand Magus Antonidas
effect: Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at random enemies. ( /3)
flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

name: Grommash Hellscream
effect: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Haleh, Matron Protectorate
effect: After you cast a spell, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Oh, how do you solve a problem like Onyxia?

name: High Exarch Yrel
effect: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
effect: Summon a 10/10 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

name: Illidari Inquisitor
effect: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
flavor: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.

name: Jace Darkweaver
effect: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

name: Jewel of N'Zoth
effect: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

name: Kalecgos
effect: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Kazakusan
effect: Battlecry: If you played 4 other Dragons this game, craft a custom deck of Treasures. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavor: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

name: Lightforged Cariel
effect: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Equip a 2/5 Immovable Object.
flavor: Her faith, unshakable. Her shield, immovable. Her enemies, irredeemable.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
effect: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Lord Marrowgar
effect: Battlecry: Raise ALL of your Corpses as 1/1 Risen Golems with Rush. For each that can't fit, give one +2/+2.
flavor: And now, Lord Marrowgar with the weather.

name: Maddest Bomber
effect: Battlecry: Deal 12 damage randomly split among all other characters.
flavor: Talk about a name that limits design space.

name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

name: Mordresh Fire Eye
effect: Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

name: Murozond the Infinite
effect: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Natalie Seline
effect: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Plagued Protodrake
effect: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Power Word: Fortitude
effect: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

name: Primordial Drake
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Primordial Protector
effect: Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
effect: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
effect: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Shadowcrafter Scabbs
effect: Battlecry: Return all minions to their owner's hands. Summon two 4/2 Shadows with Stealth.
flavor: Sneaking behind enemy lines isn't so different from being a line cook. People are hostile, something's on fire, and your only hope is to get out of there with all your fingers.

name: Sheldras Moontree
effect: Battlecry: The next 3 spells you draw are Cast When Drawn.
flavor: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

name: Smokescreen
effect: Draw 5 cards. Trigger any Deathrattles drawn.
flavor: Pocket smoke!

name: Soulstealer
effect: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
flavor: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

name: Supreme Abyssal
effect: Can't attack heroes.
flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

name: Taintheart Tormenter
effect: Taunt Your opponent's spells cost (2) more.
flavor: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?

name: Templar Captain
effect: Rush. After this attacks a minion, summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt.
flavor: You can combine two of these into a Captain Archon.

name: Tidal Wave
effect: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Tirion Fordring
effect: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Troll Centurion
effect: Rush. Honorable Kill: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

name: Troublemaker
effect: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavor: "Prepare for trouble!" "Make it double!"

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
effect: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Twisting Nether
effect: Destroy all minions.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind
effect: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Xyrella, the Devout
effect: Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.

name: Alexstrasza
effect: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone. Except Deathwing. And Malygos. And Nekros.

name: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
effect: Battlecry: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore 8 Health. If it's an enemy, deal 8 damage.
flavor: Friendly Fire: Off

name: Ancient Void Hound
effect: At the end of your turn, steal 1 Attack and Health from all enemy minions.
flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

name: Blood of G'huun
effect: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Carnival Clown
effect: Taunt Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this. Corrupt: Fill your board with copies.
flavor: Send in the clowns!

name: Fizzy Elemental
effect: Rush Taunt
flavor: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

name: King Krush
effect: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Libram of Hope
effect: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Mal'Ganis
effect: Your hero is Immune. Your other Demons have +2/+2.
flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

name: Malygos the Spellweaver
effect: Battlecry: Draw spells until your hand is full.
flavor: After many years, Malygos has decided mortals can use magic. ALL THE MAGIC!

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
effect: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
flavor: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

name: Obsidian Statue
effect: Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
effect: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavor: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Pit Commander
effect: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

name: Rattlegore
effect: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: Runaway Blackwing
effect: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Rune of the Archmage
effect: Cast 20 Mana worth of Mage spells at enemies.
flavor: “It’s not a slot machine! It took YEARS of rigorous studying the intricacies of the universe to unravel the strands of reality. The arcane knowledge alone would enfeeble even the most brilliant of minds. Give it the credence it deserves. It’s a magic slot machine.”

name: Sleepy Dragon
effect: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Stitched Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each Corpse you've spent this game.
flavor: Sew big or go home!

name: Wing Commander Ichman
effect: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck and give it Rush. If it kills a minion this turn, repeat.
flavor: “Mulverick, it’s not your flying, it’s your faction.”

name: Ysera the Dreamer
effect: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavor: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!

name: Ysiel Windsinger
effect: Your spells cost (1).
flavor: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. *But not less than (1)

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
effect: Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Darkmoon Rabbit
effect: Rush, Poisonous Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
effect: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Discard a card for each destroyed.
flavor: "He’s Deathwing? That one's Deathwing? You're Deathwing!? I'm DEATHWING! ARE THERE ANY OTHER DEATHWINGS I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT?"

name: Drakefire Amulet
effect: Tradeable Discover 2 Dragons. Summon them.
flavor: "...and I only had to climb up the mountains in Winterspring 50 times!"

name: Flesh Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavor: "A BIG mistake."

name: Goldshire Gnoll
effect: Rush Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Iceblood Tower
effect: At the end of your turn, cast another spell from your deck. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: “Why is it called Iceblood Tower?” “Not really sure. Anyways, try not to lose your footing on any of the frozen bodies as you make your way in.”

name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
effect: Rush, Windfury Costs (5) less if you have 15 Health or less.
flavor: Suddenly the names of Iceblood Tower and Iceblood Garrison make a lot more sense.

name: Nagrand Slam
effect: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Pyroblast
effect: Deal 10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Raid Boss Onyxia
effect: Rush. Immune while you control a Whelp. Battlecry: Summon six 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

name: Scrapyard Colossus
effect: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
flavor: Heap on heapin' on.

name: Sea Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor: See? Giant.

name: Shield Shatter
effect: Deal 5 damage to all minions. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
flavor: "Is the shield being shattered or doing the shattering?" "Yes."

name: Survival of the Fittest
effect: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
effect: Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
effect: Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavor: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Clockwork Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

name: Mountain Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Ur'zul Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Nothing personal, tiny human. I have many mouths to feed.

name: Molten Giant
effect: Costs (1) less for each Health your hero is missing.
flavor: He gets terrible heartburn. BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.
